Okay. I'll go. If you don't want me, I'll go.
translation.fr: D'accord. - Si tu ne veux pas de moi, je m'en vais. - J'ai pas dit ça.

translation.en: - I'll get my bag. - I'm not saying I don't want you,
translation.fr: - Si tu ne veux pas de moi, je m'en vais. - J'ai pas dit ça.

translation.en: I'm wondering why you didn't call me to tell me you were coming.

translation.en: You didn't call me on Mother's Day, I'm not holding that against you.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas appelé pour la fête des mères, je ne te le reproche pas.

translation.en: I texted you.
I birthed you.
Anyway, it's not why I'm here. I found you a nice Jewish girl.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas là pour ça. Je t'ai trouvé une gentille fille juive.

translation.en: You weren't even Jewish.
I converted, for you. Okay, you converted for Dad.
translation.fr: - Je me suis convertie pour toi. - Non, pour papa.

translation.en: Yes, so we could raise our kids as Jews. So, stop dating the shiksas.
translation.fr: Oui, pour que nos enfants soient juifs. Arrête de fréquenter des shiksas.

translation.en: Are you talking about Erin?
Erin. What kind of name is that? It's like the leftovers of a Scrabble hand.
translation.fr: C'est quoi ce nom, les lettres restantes d'une main de Scrabble ?

translation.en: That's a character flaw now, her name?
You met her once. You barely even spoke to her.
translation.fr: Tu ne l'as vue qu'une fois.

translation.en: - You never even gave her a chance. - I saw her social media.
translation.fr: - Tu ne lui as pas laissé sa chance. - J'ai vu ses réseaux.

translation.en: A lot of margarita nights.
- She's a drinker. - I'm a drinker.
You're a thinker. You use alcohol as a coping mechanism.
translation.fr: Tu réfléchis. L'alcool t'aide à faire face.

translation.en: That's the definition of alcoholism.
You're an intellectual, she's a hairdresser. Hairstylist. And so what?
translation.fr: - Tu es intellectuel, elle est coiffeuse. - Styliste capillaire, et ?

translation.en: So, let her style your hair, but don't procreate with her.
translation.fr: Demande-lui une coupe mais ne lui fais pas d'enfants.

translation.en: That is so classist and offensive.
And it's over, so why don't you just move on, okay?
translation.fr: Et c'est terminé, donc change de disque.

translation.en: I have.
Remember the Brimers?
- Ivan and Joan. - No.
On the corner. They had that horrible little Shih Tzu
translation.fr: Du bout de la rue.  - Avec l'affreux Shih Tzu qui t'a mordu. - Je m'en souviens.

translation.en: - that bit you when you were six. - I remember the dog.
translation.fr: - Avec l'affreux Shih Tzu qui t'a mordu. - Je m'en souviens.

translation.en: Well, Joan's sister has a nephew by marriage in Yonkers,
translation.fr: La sœur de Joan a un neveu par alliance à Yonkers,

translation.en: and he gave me this number of this brilliant woman from his temple.
translation.fr: il m'a donné le numéro d'une femme de sa synagogue.

translation.en: She's just been through a painful divorce, which apparently was not her fault at all.
translation.fr: Elle sort d'un divorce douloureux, elle n'y était pour rien.

translation.en: Okay, good to know.
And she is a beautiful person.
- She's friends with his wife. - Oh, my God, Ma,
translation.fr: C'est l'amie de sa femme. Tu ne l'as jamais rencontrée, si ?

translation.en: - you've never even met her, have you? - I saw her social media.
translation.fr: Tu ne l'as jamais rencontrée, si ? J'ai vu ses réseaux.

translation.en: She is smart. She did a beach clean- up.
translation.fr: Elle est intelligente. Elle a nettoyé une plage.

translation.en: She's starting to think about dating again.
We got to get in there fast.
When I reached out to her, I told her you were nearby and in a similar boat.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit que tu étais dans la même situation.

translation.en: - She said she'd love to hear from you. - Why have you done this?
translation.fr: - Elle aimerait que tu l'appelles. - Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Her name is Alison.
She graduated from Brown, she has a political science degree,
translation.fr: Diplômée de Brown en sciences politiques,

translation.en: she does something in television.
Let me get this straight.
You want me to go on a date with this woman

translation.en: based on the fact that she attends temple with some guy in Yonkers
translation.fr: parce qu'elle va à la synagogue avec un lointain parent

translation.en: who's somehow related to the woman whose dog bit me when I was a kid.
translation.fr: de la proprio du chien qui m'a mordu quand j'étais petit ?

translation.en: You can't hold that horrible dog against her.
translation.fr: Ne lui en veux pas pour son chien.

translation.en: I'm not talking about the dog, Ma.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas du chien.

translation.en: I'm talking about your insanity.
Good shot.
Have you had a date since you've lived here?

translation.en: I don't think this apartment is helping at all.
- It's like you're living in Gollum's cave. - Okay, Ma, thanks for the dating advice.
translation.fr: On dirait la grotte de Gollum. Merci pour tes conseils.

translation.en: Please, just leave it. Please.
I'm not leaving New York until you call her.

translation.en: You can't force me to go on a date with someone.

translation.en: I call it prodding, a gentle little nudge.
translation.fr: Je ne t'oblige pas, je t'encourage.

translation.en: Okay, I'll be back at supper time.
I need my Mace and my keys.
translation.fr: Ma bombe au poivre et mes clés.

translation.en: I'll be back... alive. Hopefully.
translation.fr: À tout à l'heure... si je survis.

translation.en: Hi, is this Alison?
My mom said I should call you.
translation.fr: Ma mère m'a dit de t'appeler.

translation.en: So, Paul lives with his...
- Andre? - Yes, and some other people.
It's kind of great. It's sort of a group home for gays.
translation.fr: C'est super. Une coloc de gays.

translation.en: There's an older Wall Street guy that owns the place and a tiny man who is very abrupt.
translation.fr: Le propriétaire est trader et il y a un petit bonhomme malpoli.

translation.en: I told Andre I was gonna cook for the whole gang tonight.
translation.fr: J'ai promis de cuisiner pour tout le monde.

translation.en: You? Cooking? That's more shocking than your son coming out.
translation.fr: Toi, cuisiner ? C'est plus surprenant que le coming-out de ton fils.

translation.en: Well, apparently, he's been completely out to everybody but me.
translation.fr: Apparemment, il l'a dit à tout le monde sauf à moi.

translation.en: - Oh, honey, he just assumed you knew. - I did know.
translation.fr: - Il se disait que tu le savais. - Oui.

translation.en: - Well, we all knew. - No, I didn't.
translation.fr: - On le savait toutes. - Pas moi.

translation.en: Why am I the last to get the memo? You're not. Larry is.
translation.fr: - Je suis la dernière au courant. - Non, c'est Larry.

translation.en: He had one foot out of the door by the time Paul was in high school.
translation.fr: Il était déjà en partance quand Paul était au lycée.

translation.en: So, I thought, I'm gonna let him find out by himself.
translation.fr: Je vais le laisser se débrouiller.

translation.en: You know, his only son. It's gonna drive that closed- minded lying dickhead crazy.
translation.fr: Son fils unique, ça va le rendre marteau, ce gros naze.

translation.en: Oh, Larry. Can we talk about something else?
Absolutely. How's Daniel?
It's worse than I imagined. That's never happened to me before.
translation.fr: C'est pire que prévu, c'est nouveau pour moi.

translation.en: I under- worry.
Well, all the more reason for you to leave your hotel
translation.fr: Raison de plus pour quitter ton hôtel

translation.en: and move in like Helen and I did.
translation.fr: et aller chez lui, comme nous.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm in a hotel, too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je suis à l'hôtel.

translation.en: What?
Yes, I know what I said, but, you know, Paul's got his plate full
translation.fr: Je sais ce que j'ai dit, mais Paul est débordé,

translation.en: and doesn't need a house guest on top of it, you know?
translation.fr: il n'a pas besoin d'une invitée en plus.

translation.en: So, he forgot Mother's Day. Big deal.
translation.fr: Il a oublié la fête des mères, et alors ?

translation.en: - Big deal? - Yeah.
What? You got me drunk and made me come here.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez soûlée et amenée ici.

translation.en: But seriously... how do you live in this town and forget Mother's Day?
translation.fr: Franchement, comment oublier la fête des mères quand on vit ici ?

translation.en: Look. Mother, mom, mama, Mutter, madre, maman.
translation.fr: Regardez : Mother, mom, mama, Mutter, madre, maman.

translation.en: This is Joseph.
Look at these cute bags. Let's go in.
No. Paul does Joseph. He did these windows.
translation.fr: Non, c'est un client de Paul, il a fait ces fenêtres.

translation.en: I am so moving in with that fucker.
translation.fr: Je vais emménager chez ce fumier.

translation.en: Hi.
Are you the famous writer?
Either my mom exaggerated, or you're meeting someone else.
translation.fr: Ma mère a exagéré ou tu te trompes de gars.

translation.en: - I'm Alison. - Daniel.
You write for The New Yorker, that's pretty famous.
translation.fr: Tu écris pour The New Yorker, c'est connu.

translation.en: I don't write for The New Yorker.
I thought your mom said you did write for The New Yorker.
translation.fr: C'est ce que m'a dit ta mère.

translation.en: The New Yorker published one short story of mine four years ago, which...
translation.fr: The New Yorker a publié une de mes nouvelles il y a quatre ans.

translation.en: resulted in a very small book deal, but as of yet, no book.

translation.en: - I might have heard of them. - No, you haven't.
Come on, tell me.
- The Willacoochee River Journal. - No.
I know, it's funny, right?
- You're making that up. - I wish I could make that up.

translation.en: Sadly, that is non- fiction. That is my life.
translation.fr: Hélas, ce n'est pas de la fiction. C'est ma vie. Ma mère est trop bavarde.

translation.en: My mom should talk less.
translation.fr: C'est ma vie. Ma mère est trop bavarde.

translation.en: Yeah, but if your mom talked less, we wouldn't be here right now, so... you know, thank God for your mother, right?

translation.en: Daniel!
If you're there and you're pretending you're not, I'm never talking to you again.

translation.en: Or maybe that's what you want.

translation.en: What?
Oh, God, this is totally unsafe.
Oh, come on.
Open?
Come on, old girl.
You still got it.
Mice!

translation.en: - No. - Yeah.
Fabulous.
Yes, and ridiculous. You're supposed to have sex
translation.fr: Oui, et ridicule. C'est un lieu où trouver des partenaires sexuels ou de défonce, pas un mari.

translation.en: with people you meet there, do drugs with them, not marry them.
translation.fr: C'est un lieu où trouver des partenaires sexuels ou de défonce, pas un mari.

translation.en: I think Larry fell in love with me for my looks

translation.en: and just tolerated me for everything else.
translation.fr: et a seulement toléré le reste.

translation.en: Does that sound terribly vain?

translation.en: Look who you're talking to. I'm window dressing for a window dresser.
translation.fr: M'en parlez pas, j'habille les comptes d'un décorateur.

translation.en: But you two are happy?
Yeah.
He says he'd like me to be older or flabbier
translation.fr: Il dit qu'il me préférerait plus gros

translation.en: so when he leaves for work, he won't have to wonder if I'll be here when he gets home.
translation.fr: pour être sûr de me retrouver en rentrant du travail.

translation.en: Since when is Paul so insecure?

translation.en: - He gets that from you. - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Il tient ça de vous. - Oui.

translation.en: You were preoccupied
between husbands, dating, hosting charity events.
translation.fr: entre votre vie amoureuse et vos soirées caritatives.

translation.en: You were hurt after the divorce.
Right? Lost? I get that.
But he felt a little abandoned.
Well, he never told me that.
translation.fr: Il ne me l'a jamais dit.

translation.en: Hey.
- Hey! - There he is.
Are you cooking? Well, yeah.
I was falling out of love with him,
but I thought I was falling out of love with myself. Know what I mean?
translation.fr: mais c'est surtout moi que je n'aimais plus. - Tu vois ? - Non, pas vraiment.

translation.en: No, not really.
Think of yourself as an egg.
translation.fr: Imagine que tu es un œuf.

translation.en: - Okay, why? - Because the egg is you, okay?
It's your self- love, your self- worth. You're the egg, right?
translation.fr: C'est ton estime de soi. Tu es l'œuf.

translation.en: So good love presses on the ends of you, you know,
translation.fr: L'amour positif appuie sur tes extrémités.

translation.en: but what happens when you press on the ends of an egg?
translation.fr: Ça donne quoi, sur un œuf ?

translation.en: I don't know.
Nothing. Good love challenges the egg, puts pressure on the egg,
translation.fr: Rien. Ça teste l'œuf, ça le soumet à la pression,

translation.en: but allows the egg to stay whole.
But what does it take to turn good love into bad love?
An expiration date?
No. The egg twists, okay? That's it.
translation.fr: - Une date d'expiration ? - Non. Tourner l'œuf.

translation.en: Now, suddenly, the pressure is on the sides of the egg.
translation.fr: La pression passe sur les côtés.

translation.en: - Okay? And then, what happens? - We break the egg analogy?
Yes, Daniel. It breaks, all right.
So, who broke your egg, Daniel?
translation.fr: Alors, qui a cassé ton œuf ?

translation.en: I waited five weeks.
To bang your trainer? Five weeks...
translation.fr: - Pour te taper ton coach ? - Cinq semaines...

translation.en: without a word.
I felt like you were happy for the chance to walk away.
translation.fr: Tu voulais partir de toute façon, non ?

translation.en: I came... to tell you that I decided.
translation.fr: Je suis venu te dire que j'ai décidé...

translation.en: I always thought I had to finish my novel first or make something of my life,

translation.en: and then, I finally realized...
all I ever wanted was you, and for us to be together, and...

translation.en: maybe we'll... one day have children.
translation.fr: Et qu'un jour, peut-être, on aurait des enfants.

translation.en: And that would be the purpose of our lives, the best thing that we'd ever do.
translation.fr: Et ça deviendrait le sens de notre vie, la plus belle chose qui soit.

translation.en: I was wrong.
No.
Who broke your egg?
Okay, look... - Alison. - Yep.
I'm here to get rid of my mother, and you're here to talk about your ex- husband.

translation.en: So, why don't we just call it over easy and be done with it?

translation.en: I'm gonna give you an answer to that question,

translation.en: even though I don't think you'll understand it,
translation.fr: Je vais répondre à la question, même si tu ne comprendras pas et que tu ne le mérites pas.

translation.en: and I don't think you deserve it.
translation.fr: même si tu ne comprendras pas et que tu ne le mérites pas.

translation.en: - I'm telling you I don't deserve it. - Okay.
- You don't have to. - You don't fix the egg.

translation.en: It doesn't matter who twisted it, it's broken.
translation.fr: Peu importe qui l'a tourné, il est cassé.

translation.en: And you gotta let it go.
And once you've truly bid that egg farewell, you'll... you'll find a new egg.

translation.en: Thank you.
That was...
I really need the check right now. I don't think I can hear about the egg anymore. I'm sorry.

translation.en: All right. I was gonna split the bill with you,
but now I'm not so...
thank you. Fair. Good luck with your egg hunt.

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, I'm so glad we just finally get to sit down and have a meal together.

translation.en: Shame on you, Paul.
You know, what is this bullshit about having to come out?

Why can't parents just see what they see and figure it out for themselves?

And it is not something I need to confess.

Beautiful.
You just made my night.
Now all you have to do is tell your father.

that I ruined your life

Mom.

I love you.
Mom.
I would do anything for you,

I would like to stay here for a few nights if that's all right.
- Well, there's not really a guest room. - It's okay.

Matthew Walker.
Dartmouth graduate.

Mom!

girlfriend?

makes her...

translation.en: Mom, I really admire you.
And I get why you're sharing this story with me.
translation.fr: Je comprends pourquoi tu me dis ça.

translation.en: I just don't think I'm built like that.
translation.fr: Mais je ne suis pas comme ça.

translation.en: This is your life.
This big, bruised, bloody, beautiful thing.
translation.fr: Ce gros machin abîmé, sanguinolent et sublime.

translation.en: This is your life. I'm not going to tell you what to do.
translation.fr: C'est ta vie. Je ne te dis pas quoi faire.

translation.en: Since when?
Since today.
- Okay. - Daniel, hey.
You have been under the water for a long time.
translation.fr: C'est comme si tu avais la tête sous l'eau depuis longtemps.

translation.en: But when you come up,
you need to decide what life you want.
translation.fr: tu devras choisir la vie que tu veux.

translation.en: You got this.
I love you.
Ma.
I think I'm locked out of my apartment. Use the window. That's what I do.
translation.fr: - Je suis enfermé dehors. - Passe par la fenêtre, comme moi.

translation.en: I'm out!
Hi.
You're back.
What's the matter, sweetheart?
You and Paul have a fight?
Several.
And Gillian.
And Carol.
We didn't even drive back together.
translation.fr: On n'est même pas rentrées ensemble.

translation.en: Everyone is...
sick of me,
and... so am I.
Frank, why did you marry me?
What?
Well, I think what everybody wonders is why you married me.
translation.fr: Tout le monde se demande pourquoi tu m'as épousé.

translation.en: No, really.
Why?
You're kind.
And you're smart. You're funny as hell.
translation.fr: Tu es intelligente et tu es drôle.

translation.en: You have a lot of love to give.
translation.fr: Tu as beaucoup d'amour à donner.

translation.en: - I do, right? - Yes.
And you're opinionated,
and passionate.
Sometimes you have sharp edges, and I like that.
translation.fr: Parfois, tu es un peu cassante, et ça me plaît.

translation.en: You tell it like it is.
My...
looks?
Oh, you think I married you for your personality?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je t'ai épousée pour ta personnalité ?

translation.en: You come in a very... beautiful package.
translation.fr: Tu es emballée dans un très beau paquet.

translation.en: But that's not all there is to Helen Halston.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne résume pas Helen Halston.

translation.en: I am so lucky.
- Oh, really? - Yes. We're doing it.
Thanks for coming. Your texts wore me down.
translation.fr: - Merci d'être venue. - Tu m'as eue à l'usure.

translation.en: Did you bring a pen?
- Hey, Mrs. Walker. More flowers. - It must be some mistake.
translation.fr: - Mme Walker, encore des fleurs. - C'est une erreur.

translation.en: I didn't order any flowers.
There's a note with them.
Her favorite flower is... an Iris.
translation.fr: Ses fleurs préférées sont les iris.

translation.en: Well, thank you, Shawn.
And I know that because she told me when she asked me for ten things I know about her.
translation.fr: Elle me l'a dit en me demandant dix choses que je sais sur elle.

translation.en: - Then you can't use it. - What? Yes, I can. It's a freebie.
translation.fr: - Ne t'en sers pas, alors. - Si, c'est facile.

translation.en: If you can't think of ten things you know about your mother
translation.fr: Si tu ne sais pas dix choses sur ta mère

translation.en: without one of them being something she flat- out told you, then you're a shitty son.
translation.fr: sans qu'elle ait à te les dire texto, tu es un mauvais fils.

translation.en: I am not a shitty son. Then think about why you love her and write it down.
translation.fr: - Je suis pas un mauvais fils. - Alors écris pourquoi tu l'aimes.

translation.en: I know she loved my father, and he wasn't that lovable.
translation.fr: Elle aimait mon père. Et c'était difficile.

translation.en: He was always working.
Even when we played, it was work.
translation.fr: Même nos jeux, c'était du travail.

translation.en: My mom was the one who taught me how to have fun.
translation.fr: Ma mère m'a appris à m'amuser.

translation.en: When I was a kid, she used to...
read me these bedtime stories, and...
she'd pretend there was one more page.
translation.fr: elle faisait semblant qu'il y avait une autre page.

translation.en: And we'd make up a new ending.
- Write that down. - Oh, yeah.
She did a lot of art when I was a kid.
Pen and ink note cards,
oil paintings from photographs.
This one time, she did this...
great mural on my wall.
translation.fr: une superbe fresque sur mon mur.

translation.en: One:
You loved my father.
Two:
You taught me how to have fun.
Three:
You could have been an artist.
Number four: She thinks you're a good person.
translation.fr: Quatre : elle pense que tu es quelqu'un de bien.

translation.en: No, she doesn't. She told me.
translation.fr: - Pas du tout. - Elle me l'a dit.

translation.en: She told you that she thinks that I'm good?
translation.fr: Elle t'a dit ça à propos de moi ?

translation.en: You could write she's the only person who thinks you're good.
translation.fr: Écris qu'elle est seule au monde à le penser.

translation.en: I never knew that she thought that.
Four:
You're the only person in the world who thinks I'm good.
translation.fr: Tu es la seule personne qui pense que je suis quelqu'un de bien.

translation.en: Five:
You made me feel loved and safe.
translation.fr: Avec toi, je me sentais aimé et protégé.

translation.en: Six:
You cut up fruit for my snacks even when I begged for junk food.
translation.fr: Tu me donnais des fruits quand je demandais des cochonneries.

translation.en: Seven:
You still call me, even when I ignore you.
translation.fr: Tu m'appelles encore, même quand je t'ignore.

translation.en: Thank you.
Eight:
The only times I've ever seen you angry are times you deserved to be angrier.
translation.fr: Les seules fois où je t'ai vue en colère, tu aurais dû l'être encore plus.

translation.en: Nine:
You love to dance.
Ten:
You're my mother.
Eleven:
You taught me there is room in every story... for a better ending.
translation.fr: Tu m'as appris que dans toute histoire, il peut exister une meilleure fin.

translation.en: Erin!
Erin, wait up!
I need to... get to the gym more often.
translation.fr: Je dois vraiment me remettre au sport.

translation.en: What are you doing? What are you doing?
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? - Et toi ?

translation.en: I'm moving to L.A.
- Can I talk to you first? - About what?
About us.
It's too late, Daniel. My whole life is in this truck.
translation.fr: C'est trop tard, toute ma vie est dans ce camion.

translation.en: That's funny. I was just thinking the same thing.
translation.fr: Marrant, je me disais la même chose.

translation.en: You're not gonna stop me.
Can we talk on the way?
translation.fr: On en parle sur la route ?

translation.en: - You don't have anything to do? - Please.
translation.fr: - Tu n'as rien à faire ? - S'il te plaît.

translation.en: - You're gonna drive me to L.A.? - I'm coming to L.A.
translation.fr: - Tu vas m'emmener à L.A. ? - Oui.

translation.en: I'm coming with you.
Coming to L.A.
I'm sorry. Sorry!
I'm sorry. I'm sorry, too.
- Do you know how to drive one of these? - I have no idea what I'm doing.
translation.fr: - Tu sais conduire un camion ? - Pas du tout.

translation.en: Hey, where you going?
I swear she looks like both of you. To be honest, we think she looks like your mother.
translation.fr: - Elle vous ressemble à toutes les deux. - Elle ressemble à ta mère.

translation.en: Acts like it.
- Oh, my goodness! - Speaking of the devil.
translation.fr: - Mon Dieu ! - Quand on parle du loup.

translation.en: - Or angel, depending who you ask. - Who's that?
translation.fr: - Ou de la louve. - C'est qui ?

translation.en: Grandma loves Ella!
Yay, look who it is!
- Grandma! - There's Grandma!
- Say hi to Grandma. - And you, - and you, and you. - Hi.
translation.fr: - Dis coucou. - Et toi, et toi, et toi.

translation.en: - And you. - Hi.
This is kind of a complicated garment, isn't it?
My mother's at her son's semi- Jewish wedding, and she's still complaining.
translation.fr: Ma mère est au mariage semi-juif de son fils et elle se plaint.

translation.en: You're not supposed to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.fr: Tu ne dois pas voir la mariée.

translation.en: I know, but we broke a few rules already. I think we can break one more.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais les règles, c'est pas notre truc.

translation.en: Well, he's got a point. We can show him.
translation.fr: Il a raison. On peut lui montrer.

translation.en: Thanks, Ma.
For everything.
No one's gonna notice.
There's just one little thing, though.
It's too late for a thing.
I know, but this is really an important thing.
I think we should rehearse the kiss again.
Hi!
I'm still so angry, I can barely stand to look at you.
translation.fr: Je suis encore fâchée, j'ai du mal à te regarder.

translation.en: I know. Thank you for the invitation. I invited Frank. You're his plus one.
translation.fr: - Merci pour l'invitation. - J'ai invité Frank, tu es son invitée.

translation.en: - Did you get my messages? - Yeah, about 20 of them.
translation.fr: - Tu as eu mes messages ? - Oui, les 20.

translation.en: - Did you get my texts? - Stop calling me.
translation.fr: - Et mes SMS ? - Arrête de m'appeler.

translation.en: You know...
I am kind of responsible for this whole wedding.
translation.fr: ce mariage, c'est un peu grâce à moi.

translation.en: I mean, if we hadn't gone to New York...
translation.fr: Si on n'était pas allées à New York...

translation.en: So, now we're considering that trip a success? Well, look at where we are, and...
translation.fr: - Alors, cette virée était une réussite ? - Regarde où nous sommes.

translation.en: And Carol's in Italy.
She didn't even RSVP.
She's probably too busy painting, eating pizza,
translation.fr: Elle doit être occupée à peindre, à manger de la pizza

translation.en: taking Italian lovers...
I'm sure she's miserable since she sold that house.
translation.fr: Ça a dû lui briser le cœur de vendre la maison.

translation.en: Don't start the wedding without us!
I knew she would come! I missed her so much more than I missed you.
translation.fr: - Je savais qu'elle viendrait ! - Elle m'a plus manqué que toi.

translation.en: Same here. Only double.
translation.fr: M'en parle pas, pareil pour moi.

translation.en: Oh, it's just his date.
She's too old to be his date. She's, like, his age.
translation.fr: Elle est trop vieille pour ça, elle a son âge.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
I heard there was cake. You don't call, you don't write.
translation.fr: - Il paraît qu'il y a du gâteau. - Aucune nouvelle.

translation.en: Oh, we missed you so much!
- You look so glamorous. - So do you.
By the way, I brought bourbon.
translation.fr: Au fait, j'ai apporté du bourbon.

translation.en: Oh, no! Not again!
Of course you did.
You're driving.
Get out of the car!
Let me out!
Oh, I'm out of breath.
